title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 01 May 2009 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 04:08  
Kraze left at 04:39 ("Sphinx may be image of a failed attempt to cross humans with lions.")  
tharindu\_\_ joined #xwiki at 04:40  
tharindu\_ left at 04:42 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
tharindu\_\_ left at 05:10 ("Leaving")  
arunreddy\_ left at 05:59 (Remote closed the connection)  
ChathuraPrabuddh left at 07:06 (Remote closed the connection)  
jvelociter left at 07:57 ()  
arunreddy joined #xwiki at 08:19  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 08:37  
marta\_ joined #xwiki at 08:41  
arunreddy left at 08:58 (Read error: 113 (No route to host))  
cypromis joined #xwiki at 09:16  
vmassol left at 09:28 ()  
evalica joined #xwiki at 09:32  
ChathuraPrabuddh joined #xwiki at 09:48  
trifon\_ joined #xwiki at 09:49  
arunreddy joined #xwiki at 09:49  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:50): hi ChathuraPrabuddh  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 09:51): Hai  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 09:51): How r u  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:52): fine, thanks, enjoying the holiday :)  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:52): I wanted to talk to you about your patch  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 09:52): ok go on  
arunreddy - (01/05/2009 09:53): helloo everyone  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:53): first, you shouldn't use tabs for indentation, we don't do that; you have to indent with spaces  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:53): hi arunreddy  
arunreddy\_ joined #xwiki at 09:54  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:54): then, there should be no 'style' attribute, that is... bad  
arunreddy left at 09:54 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer))  
arunreddy\_ is now known as arunreddy ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection))  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:55): you might see it in the scripts sometimes, but it's still bad  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:55): all the styling shoud be put in css  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:55): that's why sergiu warned you that changes need to be made in several places  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:56): you need to add styling rules in the skins  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:56): at least in albatross and toucan  
arunreddy - (01/05/2009 09:57): marta\_ : is it a holiday there.?  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:57): and finally, i think the class attribute would better go to the tr element  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 09:58): ok  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 09:58): I'll correct them.   
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:58): great, thanks   
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 09:58): Marta:The patch is generated by eclipse.  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:58): what you did is not wrong, it just needs to be polished, that's all  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:59): so i guess you need to change the options in eclipse  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 09:59): to put spaces instead of tabs  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 09:59): ok great thanks for that information :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 10:00): that will make it easy  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 10:00): arunreddy: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/May\_Day :)  
arunreddy - (01/05/2009 10:02): OK  
arunreddy - (01/05/2009 10:02): its not holiday here. Have an exam too  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 10:02): ah, too bad. good luck with your exam  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 10:06  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 10:06): ChathuraPrabuddh: one more thing  
trifon left at 10:06 (Read error: 113 (No route to host))  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 10:06): ya  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 10:06): the rollback link should not be displayed for the current version  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 10:07): that was the most confuzing part for the users, i think  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 10:07): the fact that they had a rollback to the newest version  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 10:08): Ok. but it was not stated in the issue. I'll try to fix it  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 10:09): well, don't be afraid to do things better than the issue says  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 10:12): ok. I saw a one of the video of u done abt Xwiki.Found it on You tube. Thats great one to get a good idea.  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 10:12): :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 10:12): Ok ill fix them. Thanx marta for ur feedback :)  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 10:15): you're welcome  
KermitTheFragger joined #xwiki at 10:17  
evalica - (01/05/2009 10:18): marta can you tell him what option he need to change in order to replace tabs with spaces in Eclipse?  
evalica - (01/05/2009 10:19): maybe this http://www.unix-girl.com/blog/archives/2005/06/eclipse\_convert.html   
evalica - (01/05/2009 10:19): but I can't remember :P   
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 10:19): evalica:I'm also looking at it now but. Is this resolve when we apply the Xwiki style sheet :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 10:20): ok thanks :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 10:25): ya Xwiki code style configure them all. Its really easy :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 10:25): evalica:Thanks for the help  
evalica - (01/05/2009 10:26): :) np Chathura  
arunreddy - (01/05/2009 10:30): marta\_ : thanks a lot  
arunreddy - (01/05/2009 10:30): :)  
evalica left at 10:36 ("ChatZilla 0.9.84 [Firefox 3.0.10/2009042316]")  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 10:37  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 10:46): marta\_: When I applied the Xwiki code style eclipse sets the Tab policy to space only. But after I creating the patch there are no difference with my previous version  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 10:50): the xwiki code style is only for the java code  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 10:51  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 10:51): So how can I configure it to patches. Any hints  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 10:51): Hai sdumitriu :)  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 10:52): Hello  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 10:55): sdumitriu: Is there a way to configure the indentations for patches in eclipse.Or do we have to do it manually  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 10:55): window ->prefs  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 10:55): Patches are patches  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 10:55): general  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 10:55): You have to write the code correctly in the first place  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 10:56): editors -> text editors  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 10:56): check 'Insert spaces for tabs'  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 10:56): ok   
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 10:57): set 2 spaces per tab (this is for velocity and javascript)  
lucaa joined #xwiki at 10:58  
trifon\_ is now known as trifon ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection))  
cypromis left at 11:18 ()  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 11:38): arunreddy: have you been working on XWIKI-3468 ?  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 11:40): i just want to know if its fix version can remain 1.9M2, or it should be moved to 1.9RC1  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 11:49): Marta:Thanks for the help but still I cant get it correct.No difference with my previous one. I better start the fixing code now.:-(  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 11:52): the settings apply for the code you write from now on, they don't change what you already wrote  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 11:52): the patch is created from the code you wrote, exactly the way you wrote it  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 11:53): so you have to type 2 spaces instead of a tab in your changes  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 11:55): Ok. Thanks a lot :).That can be the case. Marta are u using the veloeclispse editor?  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 11:55): nope  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 11:56): I always write velocity code in Kate  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 11:56): ohh  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 11:57): :)  
lucien joined #xwiki at 12:04  
ChathuraPrabuddh left at 12:07 ("Leaving.")  
ChathuraPrabuddh joined #xwiki at 12:09  
lucaa left #xwiki at 12:18  
lucien left #xwiki at 13:25  
cypromis joined #xwiki at 13:33  
cypromis left at 13:36 (Client Quit)  
lucaa joined #xwiki at 14:47  
arunreddy - (01/05/2009 15:29): marta\_:Hi marta.   
arunreddy - (01/05/2009 15:29): marta\_: Am not working on it.  
trifon left at 15:30 (Read error: 113 (No route to host))  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 15:30): ok  
arunreddy - (01/05/2009 15:32): i wonder how am i assigned to it.  
trifon joined #xwiki at 15:48  
tharindu joined #xwiki at 16:36  
tharindu - (01/05/2009 16:38): sdumitriu: Hi  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 16:38): Hi  
tharindu - (01/05/2009 16:40): I have sent an email about this but I am trying to find when to addListener, can you say how DocumentSaveEvent listner added to tha  
tharindu - (01/05/2009 16:40): can you please check the mail and say whether its ok to notify with in LoginSubmitAction class  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 16:41): Yes, I'll answer it a bit later  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 16:41): Yes, the LoginSubmitAction is OK  
tharindu - (01/05/2009 16:41): Thanks :)  
arunreddy\_ joined #xwiki at 17:01  
arunreddy left at 17:01 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer))  
tharindu\_ joined #xwiki at 17:17  
tharindu left at 17:19 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
vmassol left at 17:48 ()  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 17:52  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 19:19): Marta:Hai  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 19:20): hi ChathuraPrabuddh  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 19:21): I thought to change the place where the Current label appear. As u said about that rollback thing we can put the current label instead of the Rollback place of the current version   
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 19:21): This will also make the table clear  
KermitTheFragger left at 19:22 ("Leaving")  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 19:22): yes, perfect  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 19:23): indeed, the layout stays very clean this way  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 19:23): Also is it ok to put the span.currentversion style in the toucan.css if not where should I put it  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 19:24): yes, in toucan, and maybe also in albatross.css (some people still use it)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 19:25): Ok. Is it ok to name it that way "span.currentversion"  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 19:28): the css selector should be more specific:  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 19:28): #historyform .currentversion  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 19:29): ;-)  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 19:29): also, make sure you put the class name to the whole tr element, so it can be styled properly in cusom styles  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 19:29): in toucan.css, look for the line   
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 19:29): /\* @group Comments, attachments, History...  \*/  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 19:30): I'm using the span tag :-(  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 19:30): and put the rule in that area  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 19:30): The classname should be on the TR, and not in a span  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 19:30): Inside the TR  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 19:31): This means that you will have to put the same #if in two places  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 19:31): Once in the tr  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 19:31): To add the classname  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 19:32): And once in the actions collumn, to display the "current" text  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 19:32): We want to style not the "current" text, but the whole row  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 19:32): Ahhh got it got it :)  
cypromis joined #xwiki at 19:33  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 19:36): for the albatross skin, go to skins/albatross/xwiki.css and put the rule at the end  
ChathuraPrabudd1 joined #xwiki at 19:53  
ChathuraPrabuddh left at 19:54 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
ChathuraPrabudd1 - (01/05/2009 20:12): Sdumitriu:If I applying the style class to TR.What will happen to the odd even style which applied in the TR tags.   
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 20:12): It's not important  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 20:13): "current" is more important than "odd"  
cypromis left at 20:14 ()  
ChathuraPrabudd1 - (01/05/2009 20:15): But applying the "Current label" we can reach the both options.  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 20:15): Yes  
ChathuraPrabudd1 - (01/05/2009 20:26): sdumitriu:I'll mailed u a screen shot of what I'm saying. Just have a look. And give me a feedback  
ChathuraPrabudd1 - (01/05/2009 20:30): This way we don't want to modify the existing code. Just need to do is adding few  lines of code;-)  
arunreddy\_ left at 20:31 (Remote closed the connection)  
florinciu left at 20:39 (Remote closed the connection)  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 20:41): I replied  
ChathuraPrabudd1 - (01/05/2009 20:42): ok thanks:)  
jvelociter left at 20:49 (simmons.freenode.net irc.freenode.net)  
tharindu\_ left at 20:49 (simmons.freenode.net irc.freenode.net)  
marta\_ left at 20:49 (simmons.freenode.net irc.freenode.net)  
vmassol left at 20:49 (simmons.freenode.net irc.freenode.net)  
asyd left at 20:49 (simmons.freenode.net irc.freenode.net)  
trifon left at 20:49 (simmons.freenode.net irc.freenode.net)  
lucaa left at 20:49 (simmons.freenode.net irc.freenode.net)  
sdumitriu left at 20:49 (simmons.freenode.net irc.freenode.net)  
ChathuraPrabudd1 left at 20:49 (simmons.freenode.net irc.freenode.net)  
trifon joined #xwiki at 20:51  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 20:52  
tharindu\_ joined #xwiki at 20:52  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 20:52  
marta\_ joined #xwiki at 20:52  
asyd joined #xwiki at 20:52  
ChathuraPrabuddh joined #xwiki at 20:52  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 20:52  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 20:52): The class name has also semantic meanings  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 20:52): The whole row refers to the current version, not just the span  
lucaa joined #xwiki at 20:53  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 20:53): so how the appearance change. Is it based on the text color or background color. Otherthing is I hav to test the condition again when replacing the rollback link with "Current" label  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 20:54): It's ok to test twice, it's not that costly  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 20:55): :)but thought that its ugly   
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 20:55): Not really  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 20:55): It's OK  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 20:56): Ok tell me how the style should be  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 20:56): For the look, I think we shold let the designers decide  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 20:56): You just add the classname  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 20:57): And the style for the 'Current' label  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 20:57): The rest is somebody else's problem :-)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 20:57): Ok then two styles. :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 20:58): one for label and other for row ;-)  
tachirei joined #xwiki at 21:45  
tachirei - (01/05/2009 21:45): hi!  
tachirei - (01/05/2009 21:48): Perhaps you can help me with some hints with GSoC "Documents and Settings", please. What documents should I send, how, and what is the deadline? I'm not getting very much info from GSoC website or group. Thanks!  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 21:49): sdumitriu:I uploaded the patch to JIRA   
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 21:52): tachirei: all I can remember is that you need to send a proof that you are a student (a certificate from your university). they accept scanned copies by e-mail. i don't know other details, sorry  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 21:52): ChathuraPrabuddh: i'll take a look at the patch in a minute  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 21:53): ok.  
tachirei - (01/05/2009 21:54): marta\_: thanks, I'll ask alexamru too, perhaps he know more because he participated to GSoC 2008  
tachirei - (01/05/2009 21:54): btw: the certificate must be in English, right?  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 21:54): yes, good point  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 21:55): uhm... mine was in ro  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 21:56): but yes, you'd better talk to alex  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 21:59): ChathuraPrabuddh: yep, that's pretty much it :)  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 22:00): typo -- the 'odd' class name was left outside the quotes here: <tr class="currentversion" odd>  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 22:01): but the rest is fine  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:02): what ever the condition its get closed from the last </tr> (look at the historyinline.vm)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:02): OOpps  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:02): sorry  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:03): marta: Is everything ok now :)  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 22:04): yes, the little problem i mentioned will be corrected at commit  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 22:04): thanks for the contribution :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:07): Sdumitiu & Marta: Thanks for the help and the guidance. I'll try to correct the mistakes that I had done in the next time :)  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 22:07): you're welcome  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 22:08): let us know if you want a new issue :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:08): I have to decide it  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:09): Sdumitriu what abt that gsoc blog assignment :)  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 22:09): It's not an assignment  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 22:09): A suggestion  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:10): Should I do another issue or should I work on that   
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:10): ok sorry  
tachirei left #xwiki at 22:10  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:15): Meanwhile I'm reading the "Better Builds with Maven"  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 22:15): Cool  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:17): sdumitriu: Any recommended books for "plexus"  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 22:23): No  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 22:23): I don't think they have one  
lucaa left at 22:24 ("Leaving.")  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 22:24): But you should read about Inversion of Control  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 22:24): That's what Plexus is doing  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:24): ya   
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:25): I studied them.Its Focusing component base architecture :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:26): Sdumitriu:When we gonna start the projects  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 22:26): Whenever you want  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 22:27): The official start date is in 3 weeks  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:27): I think I have to start resolving the conflicts in my proposal.  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 22:27): But you can stqrt wenever you feel ready  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:29): I haven't see ludovic   
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:29): Don't kno abt his plans  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:33): marta\_,sdumitriu:Any recommended books that we have to read to get familiar with the development.  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 22:34): We don't have anything specific to XWiki, the ones I recommended here are good  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 22:35): Refactoring, Test Driven Development, Clean Code, Design Patterns  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 22:35): But the best way to learn is practice  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:37): :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (01/05/2009 22:47):  I'm going to sleep now.Good night. Hope to c u all tomorrow.Bye :)  
marta\_ - (01/05/2009 22:47): good night  
sdumitriu - (01/05/2009 22:48): Bye  
ChathuraPrabuddh left at 22:50 ("Leaving.")  
sdumitriu left at 23:01 ("Leaving.")  
vmassol left at 23:53 ()
